dsOverview.title: Monthly Canadian Riverflow Data

summary.p: This dataset contains monthly riverflow data for stations (gauges) on Canadian rivers and streams.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: CA/EC/WSC > Water Survey of Canada, Environment Canada

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Hydrosphere > Surface Water > Rivers/Streams
EARTH SCIENCE > Hydrosphere > Surface Water > Discharge/Flow
